title: Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon
theory: Shirahoshi is theorized to be Poseidon, one of the three Ancient Weapons, based on her identity as the Mermaid Princess and the historical significance of her lineage. The theory suggests that Poseidon is not an object but a hereditary ability passed down to certain members of the royal family every 100 years, granting the power to communicate with and command Sea Kings.
author: One Piece Community (Multiple Theorists)

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: This theory is confirmed in Episode 548 when it's revealed that Shirahoshi is indeed Poseidon.

evidence: Shirahoshi is the current Mermaid Princess, a title with historical significance
She possesses an unknown power that has been kept secret
The existence of ancient weapons has been foreshadowed throughout the series
Previous Mermaid Princess during the Void Century was confirmed to be Poseidon
Shirahoshi's ability to communicate with Sea Kings matches the description of Poseidon's power

title: Joy Boy's Promise to Fish-Man Island
theory: The theory explores the connection between Joy Boy, the legendary figure from the Void Century, and his unfulfilled promise to Fish-Man Island and the original Poseidon (the Mermaid Princess of that era). Theorists suggest that Luffy may be destined to fulfill Joy Boy's ancient promise through his friendship with Shirahoshi.
author: One Piece Theory Community

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains heavy spoilers about Joy Boy, the Void Century, and endgame revelations that extend far beyond the Fish-Man Island arc.

evidence: Joy Boy left an apology to Fish-Man Island on a Poneglyph
The apology was directed to the Mermaid Princess of that time (original Poseidon)
Luffy shares many parallels with Joy Boy's characteristics
The promise involves bringing Fish-Man Island to the surface
Ancient weapons play a role in the larger endgame of One Piece

title: Shirahoshi's Power Will Save Fish-Man Island
theory: This theory posits that Shirahoshi's true power as Poseidon will be crucial in saving Fish-Man Island from destruction. Her ability to command Sea Kings will play a decisive role in preventing catastrophe, particularly involving the massive ship Noah.
author: Fish-Man Island Arc Theorists

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Confirmed when Shirahoshi uses her power to command Sea Kings to stop Noah from destroying Fish-Man Island.

evidence: Shirahoshi's confinement suggests she has dangerous or powerful abilities
The giant ship Noah is connected to Fish-Man Island's fate
Shirahoshi's emotional nature may be connected to uncontrolled power awakening
Sea Kings have been shown near Fish-Man Island multiple times
Ancient weapons are said to have world-changing destructive or protective capabilities
